ActivityMetadata.Name: TY Create Dual Control
ActivityMetadata.Label: TY Create Dual Control
ActivityMetadata.HelpHtml:
# Thycotic

Create Dual Control

Create a new dual control

Method: Post

OperationID: DualControlsService_Create

EndPoint:

/dual-controls

Usage: dualControlApprovalGroups[]

[{ "dualControlId": "%dualControlId%", "enabled": "%enabled%", "groupId": "%groupId%", "groupName": "%groupName%", "id": "%id%" }]
